page.title: 02Living in Great Broughton
page.content: From Gt.Broughton there is a lovely view of the hills, one of which is the{Wainstones.} At the Sports Club there are two tennis courts, a football pitch, a cricket pitch and a pavillion. There are two roads running through Gt Broughton the B1257 and a small country lane. Around our village there is a lot of country-side and farms. At Broughton cross roads there is a village hall where lots of functions take place. Kirby has a Parish church, with a vicar called {Rev. S.C.Nichols,}a few yards down the road there is a church room where Sunday School and other parish activities take place. In Broughton there are two shops and a post office. In Kirby there is only the post office.
